articles.title: Trump said Harvard has seen violent crime skyrocket. Data from campus police says otherwise.
articles.description:
The Harvard Crimson editorial board slammed the Trump administration's claim that crime has risen on campus, citing university police data showing that most crimes on campus have declined.

The post Trump said Harvard has seen violent crime skyrocket. Data from campus police says otherwise. appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Update: Trump said Harvard has seen violent crime skyrocke
